title: David Sent Back from Battle
summary: As the Philistines prepare to fight Israel, their commanders distrust David and force King Achish to send him back. David returns to Ziklag instead of fighting against his own people.

faq.question: Why was David sent back by the Philistines?
faq.answer: The Philistine commanders feared he might turn against them in battle.

faq.question: How did Achish feel about David?
faq.answer: He trusted David and defended him but reluctantly sent him away.
